text: Bogomolets National Medical University is a medical university founded in 1841 in Kyiv. The university is named after a prominent physiologist Alexander Bogomolets. The university provides education for over 10,000 students. The university employs about 1,200 teaching staff. The university was founded by Russian Tsar Nicolas I. Bogomolets National Medical University is the biggest and one of the best medical universities in Ukraine. The university has 10 departments. More than 200 doctors and more than 800 candidates of sciences work in the University. title: Bogomolets National Medical University
